content.en: BCI Optimization: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to improve the performance of brain-computer interfaces (BCIs) that use EEG signals. These algorithms, such as SVM classifiers, adaptive P300-based algorithms, and machine learning algorithms, aim to optimize information transfer rates and accuracies in BCIs. Additionally, researchers are investigating the impact of different preprocessing and classification techniques, as well as stimulus parameters, on the performance of P300-based BCIs.
content.da: BCI-optimering: Forskere har udforsket forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre ydeevnen af hjerne-computergrænseflader (BCI'er), der bruger EEG-signaler. Disse algoritmer, såsom SVM-klassifikatorer, adaptive P300-baserede algoritmer og maskinlæringsalgoritmer, sigter mod at optimere informationsoverførselshastigheder og præcision i BCI'er. Derudover undersøger forskere indflydelsen af forskellige forbehandlings- og klassifikationsteknikker samt stimulusparametre på ydeevnen af P300-baserede BCI'er.
